Package agend932

Class MetacriticBrowseScrapper

java.lang.Object
agend932.MetacriticBrowseScrapper
public class MetacriticBrowseScrapper
extends Object
This class contains methods for scraping media information from Metacritic's website. It uses Jsoup to parse HTML and extract media details.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    MetacriticBrowseScrapper()

    Scrapes Metacritic for media information based on provided URL and search criteria.

  • Constructor Details

    • MetacriticBrowseScrapper

      public MetacriticBrowseScrapper()

  • Method Details

    • scrapeMetacritic

      public static List<Media> scrapeMetacritic​(String urlRequest, String mediaType, String platform, String genre)
      Scrapes Metacritic for media information based on provided URL and search criteria. Iterates through multiple pages until no more results are found.
      Parameters:
      urlRequest - The base URL for the Metacritic search query.
      mediaType - The type of media to scrape (e.g., game, movie, tv).
      platform - The platform for which to scrape media (e.g., PS5, Xbox).
      genre - The genre of media to scrape (e.g., Action, RPG).
      Returns:
      A list of Media objects containing the scraped media information.

    • extractMediaFromElement

      private static Media extractMediaFromElement​(org.jsoup.nodes.Element result, String mediaType, String platform, String genre)
      Extracts media details from an HTML element and creates a Media object.
      Parameters:
      result - The Jsoup element containing media details.
      mediaType - The type of media to scrape.
      platform - The platform for which to scrape media.
      genre - The genre of media to scrape.
      Returns:
      A Media object populated with details from the HTML element.
